script: There is a Retail Area in the center of my hometown.
I visited High Street, which is 3 KM, West from Retail Area.
Town Hall is a location in my home town, it is 2 KM, North from High Street.
About 1 km West of the Town Hall there is a Playground
Museum is a location in my home town, it is 3 KM, East from Playground.
And finally there is Park which is East from Museum and 2 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Retail Area to Park following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
From Retail Area, go 3km West to High Street.
From High Street, go 2km North to Town Hall.
From Town Hall, go 1km West to Playground.
From Playground, go 3km East to Museum.
From Museum, go 2km East to Park.
